text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump As the US excedes 1 million COVID-19 cases and approaches 60,000 deaths, let's remember that South Korea has had 244 deaths.

244 deaths. Population 51 million. 1st case on the same day. Mortality 2.2%.

So much winning from Trump!
Stop spinning and LYING 🤥. 
Nobody's buying!
